SourceProxy.name: AdaptiveCosmoCore

Documentation.long_help: Reads a cosmology file into a vtkUnstructuredGrid.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Adaptive Cosmo reader reads in multi-resolution, sampled binary data written in the LANL cosmo Format.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. The list is treated as a sequence as per a predefined adaptive structure generated from a preprocessor.

IntVectorProperty.name: ByteSwap
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, the data will be read and byte-swapped.

IntVectorProperty.name: TagSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the endian of the file.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BoxSize
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The box side length is used to wrap particles around if they exceed rL (or less than 0) in any dimension.

IntVectorProperty.name: Level
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the desired level of resolution.
